comments.body: Looks like it's actually a [`Promise<void>`](https://github.com/catdad/canvas-confetti/blob/master/src/confetti.js#L190) ([when it's not `null`](https://github.com/catdad/canvas-confetti/blob/master/src/confetti.js#L45)), but that's also a problem with the top level `function confetti`
